com.google.appinventor.buildserver
Class Compiler

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.buildserver.Compiler

public final class Compiler
extends Object

Main entry point for the YAIL compiler.

Supplies entry points for building Young Android projects.

Author:
markf@google.com (Mark Friedman), lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

compile

public static boolean compile(Project project,
                              Set<String> componentTypes,
                              PrintStream out,
                              PrintStream err,
                              PrintStream userErrors,
                              boolean isForRepl,
                              String keystoreFilePath,
                              int childProcessRam)
Builds a YAIL project.

Parameters:
project - project to build
componentTypes - component types used in the project
out - stdout stream for compiler messages
err - stderr stream for compiler messages
userErrors - stream to write user-visible error messages
isForRepl - true, if this compilation is for the special REPL app
keystoreFilePath -
childProcessRam - maximum RAM for child processes, in MBs.
Returns:
true if the compilation succeeds, false otherwise
